group_1.textLeft: You want me to play with you...?

group_1.textRight: I think it's a good idea～
All you have to do is participate,
so it doesn't matter if you're good at the game@or not.
You don't even have to show your face.
And I can put on a voice changer,@so you don't have to worry about being identified!

group_1.textLeft: I might end up dragging you down, though...

group_1.textRight: We're here to support you.@It'll be fine!

group_1.textLeft: If we need a team of five,@then me and Juri should join too.
Don't you think, Juri?

group_1.textRight: The colour...of the sala flowers...reveals...

group_1.textLeft: Juri!

group_1.textRight: What now?!@I'll pitch in for a couple minutes!

group_1.textLeft: And she's joined us～

group_1.narration: "Alright, alright, here we go!@To celebrate the release of LinkS' new song,@we've got a project called...@"Link Up With eSports!""
"And now,@the moment you've all been waiting for...@The big game announcement!"
"The winner is the team that earns the most points@by defending their assigned position@of a live music venue, using song and dance@to keep the audience at bay."
"However, in order to get a high score,@you'll need to distribute food and drinks@to the audience and make a profit@on merch sales!"
"On top of that,@you have to attack and defeat rival venues@to climb to the very top@of the Idol Warring States period!"
"Okay, okay!@Let's open with our first team,@"Young, Hip, and Spunky Girls"@or YHS Girls for short..."

group_1.textRight: How are those rules "simple"?!

group_1.textLeft: Would you be able to condense that for us, Ao?

group_1.textRight: Basically, I guess it's like a tower control FPS@mixed with a rhythm game?
It's a simple combo, and I don't think the controls@are too hard to pick up～
We'll have to watch the first round for the details,@but...
There's a lot of stuff to do, like prepping food@and selling merch.
And there aren't any guns in the weapon roster,@so it's more like a beat-'em-up than an FPS.

group_1.textLeft: Wow, this is gonna take more teamwork@than I thought, huh?
Yeah... It'll be fine as long as you get some proof@to show your parents.
Does it matter if we don't win?

group_1.textRight: I'm not half-assing this!

group_1.textLeft: Ranka always plays like she means it～

group_1.textRight: Look, Round 1 is starting.

group_1.narration: "Oh my, there's a player on Team YHS Girls@who's exceptionally good at rhythm games."
"All of the songs on this album are by LinkS...@Could she be a LinkS superfan?"

group_1.textLeft: Heh heh. Piece of cake!
...Whaー Eek?!@We're surrounded by enemies!
What the heck is going on with our defense?!

group_1.textRight: [chara:101101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Fweeh?! Have I been protecting the enemy@this whole time?!

group_1.textLeft: God! What the hell are you doing?!

group_1.narration: "Are they falling apart already?@They're not working too well together, huh?"
"...Uh-oh,@there's black smoke coming from the kitchen...@Seems like they're cooking up a disaster..."

group_1.textRight: Oi!@I said I'd handle the cookin', didn't I?!

group_1.textLeft: But it would be more efficient with two of us,@wouldn't it?

group_1.textRight: Maybe, but c'mon!
...Hey, what's up with our salesman buttering up@the audience?

group_1.textLeft: Hm... If you're trying to generate sales,@does it not all begin with customer service?

group_1.textRight: I can't even argue back 'cause you're right...

group_1.narration: "The player in charge of sales@is quite the crowd-pleaser, just like a maid,@but unfortunately that's not going to net her@any points...!"
"Team YHS Girls...@Their name's terrible enough,@but the way they play is terrible too!"

group_1.textCenter: (Yuna doesn't know who they are, right...?)
(It's gonna be bad news if she recognizes them...)

group_1.textLeft: How do I set this up?

group_1.textRight: It goes like...this!

group_1.textCenter: (Looks like she's putting on a voice changer@for the game.)
(We should be focusing on our own strategy,@not the other team's.)

group_1.textRight: ...For now,@our weapons are bare hands or glowsticks.
But watch out, since you can attack both@your friends and your opponents.

group_1.textLeft: We've gotta be careful not to hit each other, then.
Working together as a team will be important...

group_1.textRight: Roger! Did you get that, Juri?
"Ardent"... means "intense".

group_1.textLeft: Juri!

group_1.textRight: WHAT?!@I wasn't listenin', but it won't be a problem!
We just gotta crush the enemy, right?

group_1.textLeft: There's more to it than that, you know～?

group_1.textRight: Leave it to me!

group_1.textLeft: ...Hmm... Are we really going to be okay～?
